original_text: I am not sending you to people who speak many different languages that you cannot understand. If I did send you to people like that, I am sure that they would listen to you.
korean_text: 너를 언어가 다르거나 말이 어려워 네가 그들의 말을 알아 듣지 못할 나라들에게 보내는 것이 아니니라 내가 너를 그들에게 보냈다면 그들은 정녕 네 말을 들었으리라

sentences.original_text: to people who speak many different languages
If I did send you to people like that
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 내가 당신을 그런 사람들에게 보낸다면
